original_text: and he shall offer the ram as a sacrifice of peace offering to the Lord, with the basket of unleavened bread. The priest shall offer also its grain offering and its drink offering.
korean_text: 화목제물로 숫양에 무교병 한 광주리를 아울러 여호와께 드리고 그 소제와 전제를 드릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: and he shall offer the ram
as a sacrifice of peace offering to the Lord
with the basket of unleavened bread
The priest shall offer also its grain offering
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 또 그 소제물을 드릴 것입니다
